item.title: ‚ÄúIntroducing Llamatik Offline LLMs for Kotlin Multiplatform‚Äù
item.description:
ü¶ô Introducing Llamatik: Offline LLMs for Kotlin Multiplatform

We‚Äôre thrilled to introduce Llamatik ‚Äî an open-source Kotlin Multiplatform library that brings local Large Language Models (LLMs) to Android, iOS, desktop, and beyond using the power of llama.cpp.

Llamatik makes it simple and efficient to integrate offline, on-device inference and embeddings into your KMP apps, whether you‚Äôre building an AI assistant, a RAG chatbot, or an edge intelligence tool.
